pailitiPage.title: 3D-PaiLiTi
pailitiPage.subtitle: Upload an image and generate a ready-to-use 3D model in one click â€” preview in real time.
pailitiPage.description: 3D-PaiLiTi is an innovative application that leverages advanced AI technology to transform your 2D images into high-quality 3D models. Simply upload a photo, and our intelligent algorithms will automatically generate a detailed 3D model that you can preview in real-time and export for use in various projects. Whether you're a designer, developer, or hobbyist, 3D-PaiLiTi streamlines your creative workflow and opens up new dimensions of possibility.

ai_modeling.title: AI Smart Modeling
ai_modeling.description: Advanced AI algorithms to convert 2D images into high-quality 3D models with one click.

export.description: Supports mainstream 3D formats like GLB and STL to meet different needs.

share.title: One-click Sharing
share.description: Easily share your 3D creations on social media or with your team.

fast.title: Fast Generation
fast.description: Optimized cloud process to quickly obtain usable 3D models.

koalaPage.title: Koala Haventree
koalaPage.subtitle: A gentle place for your feelings to land.
koalaPage.description: Koala Haventree is a unique mobile game that provides a tranquil and comforting space for relaxation and self-reflection. In this peaceful world, you can grow your own 'emotion trees,' interact with gentle forest creatures, and create a personalized haven. With its soothing art style and calming gameplay, Koala Haventree offers a gentle escape from the hustle and bustle of daily life, helping you find moments of peace and mindfulness.

emotion_card.title: Emotion Cards
emotion_card.description: Draw your exclusive emotion card to explore every fluctuation of your heart.

ai_chat.title: AI Chat
ai_chat.description: Talk to your cute koala companion anytime and share your joys and sorrows.

venting_hole.title: Tree Hollow
venting_hole.description: Safely entrust all unhappiness and secrets to the tree hollow to release your mind.

diary.title: Journaling
diary.description: Record daily life moments and mood stories to treasure your exclusive memories.

ai_report.title: AI Report
ai_report.description: Generate professional emotional reports based on your records to help you understand yourself better.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.description: Unlock unique achievements by collecting cards, chatting, and recording.
